tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
From 8 years being childless and depressed to happy father of baby boy. Personal attention and care is what is needed for female patients who have given up after several ivf cycles. The way everything was handled by Dr Shilpa was remarkable. 
Out family thanks you from bottom of our heart. Keep up the good work. 
God bless you.
Doctor had explained the issues in a friendly manner and made us comfortable. I must recommend Dr. Shilpa Shah.

The 1st appointment was very detailed where the Dr.helped us with understanding the process of the irregular periods and gave suggestions regarding the same and started medication which was followed up regularly after  a gap of week or 2 depending upon the medical condition and were always available on call.
Good explaination  about everything in detail ,with caring smile  really recommend to anyone looking out for treatment and guidance

review:
She made me feel so uncomfortable while explaining the issues ** ** * *** *** ******* *** *** ******* * **** No proper diagnosis was done and treatment provided did not work at all. Also, the clinic is not at all hygienic. 
I would not visit her again.

Dr. Shilpa explains very well. His words gave me a lot of courage. Their experience is great. Proper advice and treatment are provided
We are thankful to you
Doctor has in depth experience. I was got positive response from overall discussion. Waiting time was quite longer but you get a proper knowledge.
Doc was very sweet nd explained evrything clearly,prescribd medicns nd i was better in a week.she is very sweet nd patiently listens to all queries.

Excellent. Doctor was very friendly and answered all our questions patiently. Excellent clarity of prescription and the reasoning behind the same.
It was very good. At the first meeting she heard everything from us and then give us exact solution for our query and help us conceving. Thanks to her.
Doctor was very open in discussing key issuesshe listens everything patiently and accordingly take up the case.look forward for my next session

She is very good and very helpful and informative .explained properly .would definitely want others to know .
Best doctor for infertility vast experience

It was a very satisfying to meet the doctor who explains us first and made me understand my problem.. Which is of utmost importance. Very patient and got better with my problem after a very long time. Had seen many doctors before and done many sonography and blood check .wish I would have met Dr shilpa before .thank you doctor
She is very caring and soft spoken. She is listens to you very patiently & gives you sufficient time to say your problems.

review: She didn't ask for my consent when she was checking me and she did it with force without letting me know so I was in shock and traumatized and triggered and she didn't explain my diagnosis properly.
reply_text:
I must say that I am surprised with your feedback.

I can understand that the 1st Gynaec examination can be cumbersome experience for some and I offered my best care .Since you visited my clinic  just two days back, I very well remember using the smallest instrument with lubrication after thorough explanation prior to examination and spent good 15-20 minutes with you answering all your questions â€¦.. Plz feel free to ask any other questions if you have..
Being a lady I can understand that  its the most difficult examination one has to go through and I have always striven to make my patients comfortable and because of which I have been appreciated by all my patients in last 18 years.

Dr and her staff both were very friendly and made entire process easy and no awkwardly moment. She was very descriptive and didn't hold back any explanation which made me feel at ease.
Thank you
Very professional doctor and the communication regarding treatments towards the patients very helpful to us
